productContext.primaryProblem: Companies need SOC 2, ISO 27001, HIPAA compliance but the process is manual, painful, and expensive
urgencyDrivers: Lost deal due to lack of compliance

fintech.evidence: Financial regulations require SOC 2 Type II and often additional certifications
fintech.reasoning: Can't serve financial institutions without compliance - creates immediate urgency

healthcare.evidence: HIPAA compliance is legally required for handling patient data

saas.evidence: Enterprise customers require SOC 2 before signing contracts
saas.reasoning: Compliance is a sales blocker - direct revenue impact creates urgency

urgencyDrivers.driver: Enterprise customer requiring SOC 2 to close deal
urgencyDrivers.discoveryQuestion: Are there any deals waiting on your compliance certification?

urgencyDrivers.driver: Recent funding round with compliance requirements
urgencyDrivers.discoveryQuestion: Did compliance come up during your recent funding discussions?
What's driving the focus on security right now?
When is your next audit cycle?

indirectAlternatives: Hiring an auditor to do everything
pullFramework.statusQuoOption: Continue with manual processes and spreadsheets

competitorLimitations.differentiator: Automated evidence collection and continuous monitoring
Automated platform with expert guidance at fraction of cost

statusQuoLimitations: Can't prove compliance to customers quickly
Security team burned out on compliance tasks
qualifyingSignals: Hired or looking to hire security/compliance person
Lost a deal due to lack of SOC 2
Audit coming up in next 90 days
disqualifyingSignals: Very early stage (pre-revenue, no enterprise interest)

discoveryQuestions.question: Before we dive in - what made you take this call today? What were you hoping to get out of it?
followUps: Tell me more about that initiative...
How long has this been on your radar?
discoveryQuestions.goodAnswer: They mention SOC 2, enterprise customers, compliance certification, or security audit
discoveryQuestions.badAnswer: Just exploring, boss told me to take the call, no specific project

discoveryQuestions.question: Of all the things you could focus on right now, why is compliance a priority? What's driving the timing?
followUps: What happens if you don't have this in place by [timeline]?
Are there deals waiting on this?
Who else is feeling this pressure?
discoveryQuestions.goodAnswer: Enterprise deal waiting, audit coming up, board mandate, lost deal due to lack of compliance
discoveryQuestions.badAnswer: No specific timeline, nice to have, sometime next year

discoveryQuestions.question: What have you looked into so far? What approaches are you considering?
followUps: Have you considered building this in-house?
What would you need from a consultant vs. a platform?
discoveryQuestions.goodAnswer: They've evaluated Vanta/Drata, talked to consultants, understand the options
discoveryQuestions.badAnswer: Haven't looked at anything, this is the first call

discoveryQuestions.question: What's preventing you from just using spreadsheets or hiring a consultant to handle this?
discoveryQuestions.purpose: Understand why alternatives aren't good enough
followUps: How much time is your team spending on this today?
What's the cost of continuing with the current approach?
What would need to be different about a solution for it to work for you?
discoveryQuestions.goodAnswer: Spreadsheets don't scale, consultants too expensive, need continuous compliance
discoveryQuestions.badAnswer: Current approach is working fine, no real pain
